name: KidsQuiz
0:
”Alexa, play Kids Quiz”
”Alexa, open Kids Quiz”
”Alexa, start Kids Quiz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kids quiz
des: From the creators of Question of the Day, Kids Quiz poses fun new questions everyday for children ages 5-12, from animals and science to brainteasers and fun facts. Kids Quiz is a great way for children to reinforce their learning and discover new things about the world.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
